resources:
GeminiPro Enter a prompt here Enter a API key here https://ai.google.dev/ What is an API: API keys are usually provided by the API provider and need to be set in the application. An application provides an API key when making a request to the API, which is used by the API provider to verify that the application has permission to access the API. This App must use API. Don’t have an API key? You can click here Please enter API key
Set name, picture
Set model parameters
Set security parameters
Set apiKey
setting_name
setting_parameter
setting_safe
setting_api
temperature: the randomness of the output content. The closer it is to 1.0, the responses will be richer, more diverse, and more creative; conversely, the closer it is to 0.0, the responses will be more certain and more likely. topK: The parameter changes the way the model selects output tokens. A topK of 1 means that the selected token is the most likely token among all tokens in the model vocabulary (also known as "greedy decoding"). If topK is 3, it means that the model will select the next symbol from the three most likely symbols based on the randomness parameter. In each token selection step, the model samples the topK tokens with the highest probability. Then, the system will further filter the symbols based on topP, and finally use temperature sampling to select the final symbol. topP: The parameter changes the way the model selects output tokens. The model will select tokens in order from most likely to least likely until the sum of the likelihoods of the selected tokens equals the topP value. For example, if the probabilities of tokens A, B, and C are 0.3, 0.2, and 0.1 respectively, and the topP value is 0.5, the model will select A or B as the next token based on the randomness parameter, and exclude C . The default value of topP is 0.95. stopSequences: Set the stop sequence to instruct the model to stop generating content. The stop sequence can be any sequence of characters. Please avoid using character sequences that may appear in generated content. maxOutputTokens: The maximum number of output response Tokens. Gemini Pro model preset 2048; Gemini Pro Vision model preset 4096. candidateCount: The number of responses to be returned. Default is 1, can be set to 1~8, but currently it seems to be limited to 1. !!! After clicking, the model will adjust parameters, so the previous chat memory function will be reset.
//safe HARASSMENT: Negative or harmful comments involving identity and/or protected attributes. HATE_SPEECH: Vulgar, offensive or indecent content. SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT (sensational and explicit content): Contains sexual behavior or other obscene content. DANGEROUS_CONTENT: Promotes, encourages, or promotes harmful behavior.
HARASSMENT HATE_SPEECH SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT DANGEROUS_CONTENT
Status: There is currently an API key Status: Currently no API key
BLOCK_NONE (do not block any items): Display regardless of whether the content may be unsafe BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH (block a few): Block when content that is highly likely to be unsafe appears BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE (block some): Block all moderately or extremely unsafe content BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE: Block content that is low, medium or high likely to be unsafe HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED (default): No threshold is specified, use the default threshold to block
//name YourName： Gemini Name： Enter Your Name Enter Gemini Name Successfully modified!

Plan a trip: Experience Seoul like a local

Help me choose: a gift for dad who loves fishing
Recommended activity: Remote employee team building day…
Make family dinners: fresh ingredients, simple recipes
Learn a new craft: knitting or pottery making
Plan your next vacation: Explore unknown destinations
Read a classic novel: rediscover literary charm
Challenge yourself: Complete a new sport or challenge
Share a food journey: explore local cuisine
Participate in volunteer activities: donate time to charity
Outline a social media post: for my network
Learn a new language: broaden horizons
Cook an international dish: taste different cultures
Build a family play area: create a happy space
Discover a local museum or gallery: appreciate art and history
Start a healthy lifestyle: balance exercise, diet, mental health
Experience outdoor adventure: hiking, camping, kayaking
Learn a new skill: photography, programming, music
Plan a family movie night: choose a movie

Attend a cultural event: concert, art exhibition, theater
Prepare a homemade brunch: delicious food, pleasant atmosphere
Learn how to grow vegetables: enjoy self-sufficiency
